subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Ferrer rallied from a break down in the final set Saturday to defeat Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-3, 2-6, 7-6 (3), and set up a final against Murray at the Erste Bank Open in Vienna.
snippet: Ferrer rallied from a break down in the final set Saturday to defeat Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-3, 2-6, 7-6 (3), and set up a final against Murray at the Erste Bank Open in Vienna.
